text:
[Verse]
Spotlights shine bright
Colors in the night
Dancing in the moonlight
Feels so right

[Verse 2]
Twinkling stars above
Laughter mixes with love
Music from the heart
Let's all take part

[Chorus]
Spin around and around
Feet barely touch the ground
Midnight carnival sound
Lost and found

[Verse 3]
Crazy rides and thrills
Chasing all the chills
Joy that never ends
With my friends

[Chorus]
Spin around and around
Feet barely touch the ground
Midnight carnival sound
Lost and found

[Bridge]
The night won't last forever
Let's make this moment treasure
Dancing under pleasure
Now and never
title: Midnight Carnival
